about_the_game:
READ FIRST BEFORE PURCHASE

It has been a long, eventful journey since Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises first entered Early Access back in 2016. Over the years we faced challenges, made mistakes and learned invaluable lessons along the way. Last year, we made the difficult decision to temporarily remove the game from the Steam store to embark on a complete rebuild. And during the upcoming Steam RTS Fest we are excited to share the first iteration of that process. If you are interested in testing it out, please read on to ensure you know what to expect.

The Rebuild: A New Beginning
Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises has been rebuilt from the ground up by a small, but passionate team of original and new developers. This is not a re-release of the old game but the beginning of an entirely new saga. While we’ve made significant progress, we want to be upfront: this is just the start.

What to expect
To set expectations correctly, here’s what the first iteration of the new build will offer:

A Barebones Experience: The current version prioritizes core mechanics and stability over features and polish. Many systems are still in development and you’ll encounter placeholders and unfinished elements.

Foundational Gameplay: Expect minimal content at this stage. This release is focused on getting the basics right before expanding further. You can test the first mission of the campaign and test the systems in skirmishes. Multiplayer is available but is not properly balanced or polished.

Transparency Commitment: We’re committed to being open about the state of the game. While it is playable, it is not a full-fledged experience yet. Think of it as the foundation of what’s to come.

Why release now?
After being in bad shape for years and basically unplayable since we pulled it from the store, we felt it was essential to make something accessible again for those who have already supported us. By releasing the game during the Steam RTS Fest, we hope to re-engage with our community and invite new players to be part of this rebuilding process. It goes without questions that early supporters do not have to buy the game or any content again.

Your Role in Shaping the Game
We’re taking a community-centered development approach, and your feedback will play a critical role in shaping the future of Avalon Lords. Here is how you can help:

  • Share your thoughts on gameplay mechanics, features and balance.

  • Report bugs and technical issues to help us improve stability.

  • Suggest ideas for future content and improvements.

Join our vibrant community in the heart of Avalon! Grab a drink with the devs in our tavern, and who knows you might even score a ticket to the Players' Guild. Come hang out and be part of the adventure! 


Join us at

In the heart of Avalon Lords lies a timeless struggle between light and darkness, embodied by two formidable figures: King Arthur and the sorceress Morgana. As the beloved King Arthur, you stand as the beacon of hope for your people, striving to unite the realm and restore peace through noble leadership and courageous deeds. Your quest is to strengthen your kingdom, forge powerful alliances, and defend your lands against the encroaching darkness.

On the opposite side, Morgana, a malevolent sorceress driven by a thirst for power, casts a shadow over Avalon. Her dark magic and ruthless ambitions threaten to plunge the world into chaos and despair. With her sinister forces gathering strength, Morgana seeks to conquer and corrupt all that King Arthur holds dear.

In this epic battle between good and evil, every decision you make will shape the fate of Avalon. Will you rise to the challenge, uphold the virtues of your kingdom, and vanquish the darkness? Or will Morgana’s malevolent schemes prevail, plunging the world into eternal night? The destiny of Avalon is in your hands.


Welcome to Avalon Lords, where the magic of fantasy and the thrill of strategy come together in an unforgettable adventure. Get ready to dive into a world brimming with unique features and captivating experiences.


Legendary Quests: Embark on an epic single-player campaign that takes you through the rich and diverse world of Avalon Lords, featuring multiple factions with unique stories and challenges. Each Legendary Quest immerses you in captivating narratives and complex scenarios as you navigate through the distinct goals and conflicts of different factions. Your decisions will shape the outcome of your journey and influence the fate of the realm. Prepare for a grand adventure where every quest brings new opportunities, formidable foes, and unforgettable experiences in your quest for glory.
Expand and Conquer: Seize control of new territories and grow your empire in Avalon Lords' dynamic world. Explore uncharted lands, claim valuable resources, and establish your dominance through strategic expansion. Build and fortify your strongholds, lead your forces into battle, and outmaneuver rival factions to extend your influence. Each new conquest brings opportunities for growth and challenges that test your strategic prowess. Embrace the thrill of expansion, adapt your tactics, and build an unstoppable empire that will reshape the realm according to your vision.
Faction Mastery: Choose your path and immerse yourself in the intricate dynamics of Avalon Lords’ two distinct factions. Each faction offers its own unique strengths, abilities, and strategic advantages. Master the distinct playstyles and tactics of your chosen faction to gain a competitive edge. Develop your faction's special skills, leverage their unique resources, and navigate their specific challenges to dominate the battlefield and achieve your goals. Whether you ally with the disciplined Guardians or the cunning Shadows, your journey to faction mastery will be key to securing victory and reshaping the realm.
Diplomacy: Forge strategic alliances and navigate complex political landscapes in Avalon Lords' intricate diplomacy system. Engage with other factions through negotiations, trade agreements, and mutual pacts to strengthen your position and advance your goals. Balance your ambitions with the needs and desires of your allies and rivals, as every decision can shape the course of your realm. Master the art of diplomacy to secure peace, manipulate enemies, and build a powerful network of support to achieve your ultimate objectives.

Challenge Your Friends: Put your skills to the test and prove your strategic prowess in thrilling multiplayer battles. Compete head-to-head with friends or other players in a variety of dynamic game modes, from intense skirmishes to strategic showdowns. Customize your strategies, adapt to your opponents’ tactics, and rise through the ranks to claim your place as the ultimate champion. Whether you’re forging alliances or going solo, Challenge Your Friends offers endless opportunities for competitive fun and camaraderie in Avalon Lords.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux TBC
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo or equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux TBC
  • Processor: Core I5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 750 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“The RTS you Didn’t Know You Needed”
OnRPG

“It has the potential to be a great RTS by any standard, but only time will tell if can make it.”
GameWatcher

“Medieval RTS on the Rise with Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises”
Hardcore Gamer
short_description: "Dive into 'Avalon Lords: Dawn Rises', an RTS set in a mystical medieval world. Build your kingdom, lead vast armies, and uncover Avalon's legends. Chapter 1 launches in October, featuring the Dawn faction. Join our Discord for sneak peeks!
